SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminBrowseEvents
AdminBrowseEvents is a Fragment that allows administrators to browse, search events stored in Firebase.
AdminBrowseImages
AdminBrowseImages is a Fragment that allows administrators to view, search, and delete images stored in Firebase Storage.
AdminBrowseProfiles
AdminBrowseProfiles is a Fragment that allows administrators to view and manage user profiles stored in Firebase.
AdminDashboard
AdminDashboard serves as the main control panel for administrators, providing navigation access to various management sections of the app.
AdminEventsAdapter
AdminEventsAdapter is a RecyclerView adapter responsible for displaying a list of EventAdmin objects in the admin browse events interface.
AdminEventsDialog
AdminEventsDialog is a dialog fragment that displays detailed information about a specific EventAdmin instance for administrators.
AdminImagesAdapter
AdminImagesAdapter is a adapter used by administrators to browse, select, and manage image stored in Firebase Storage.
AdminImagesAdapter.OnSelectionChangedListener
Callback interface used to report selection changes to the parent fragment or activity.
AdminIntentNavigationTest
 
AdminLoginActivity
 
AdminProfilesAdapter
AdminProfilesAdapter is adapter responsible for displaying a list of User profiles in the admin dashboard interface.
AdminUserProfileDialog
adminUserProfileDialog is a DialogFragment that displays detailed information about a specific User.
AuthState
Small helper around the same SharedPreferences file used by the UserInfo controller ("UserPrefs").
BottomNavigationHelper
 
BottomNavigationHelper.NavItem
 
CreateEventFragment
Fragment that allows organizers to create new events.
DeleteProfileActivity
Provides entrants with an interface to permanently delete their local profile data and return to the login screen.
DeviceIdentityManager
Simplest possible way to identify a user by device.
DrawLotteryDialogFragment
A dialog fragment that allows the organizer to perform a lottery draw for an event.
EditProfileActivity
Allows entrants to edit and update their personal profile information such as name, email, and phone number.
Entrant
Represents an entrant in an event lottery.
Entrant.Status
Enum representing the status of an entrant in the lottery.
EntrantAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying entrants in waiting or selected lists.
EntrantAdapter.OnEntrantActionListener
Interface defining actions that can be performed on an entrant.
EntrantExploreActivity
Represents the "Explore" screen for entrants in the Lottery System Application.
EntrantMainActivity
Serves as the main home screen for entrants in the application.
EntrantNavigationTest
 
EntrantNotifTest
 
EntrantProfileActivity
Displays the entrant’s personal profile screen, allowing users to view and manage their account information.
EntrantProfileFragment
Represents entrant’s profile screen displayed within the profile navigation section of the app.
EntrantProfileNotificationTests
 
EntrantQRActivity
Represents the "QR" screen for entrants in the Lottery System Application.
EntrantRepository
Repository class responsible for managing entrant data.
EntrantRepository.OnActionCompleteListener
Callback for generic success or failure actions.
EntrantRepository.OnLotteryCompleteListener
Callback for reporting lottery completion results.
EntrantRepository.OnReplacementDrawnListener
Callback for when a replacement entrant is successfully drawn.
EntrantSettingsFragment
Represents the settings screen accessible from the entrant's profile section of the app.
EntrantUpdateProfileTest
 
EntrantViewModel
ViewModel that manages entrant data for a specific event.
Event
Model class representing an Event for the Entrant's in the system.
EventAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of events.
EventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
Interface for handling event item clicks.
EventAdmin
 
EventDetailsActivity
Activity for displaying detailed information about a specific event.
EventFirebase
Central data manager for handling event and user data.
EventFirebase.FirebaseCallback
A generic callback interface for Firebase operations that do not return data.
EventFirebase.RegistrationsListener
A listener interface for receiving updates to a list of registrations.
EventHistoryAdapter
Adapter class that binds EventHistoryItem objects to RecyclerView items for displaying a user's event registration history.
EventHistoryItem
Represents a single entry in an entrant’s event registration history.
EventListHelper
Helper class to populate the events list container with event cards.
EventManagementFragment
Fragment that manages an event's details, including its waiting list and selected entrants.
EventRegistrationHistoryFragment
Displays the entrant’s registration history for past and current events.
EventRepository
Repository responsible for managing event data.
EventsHistoryActivity
Displays the entrant’s event participation history.
EventViewModel
ViewModel for managing event data.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
FakeKeyValueStore
Test-only in-memory key-value store
FirebaseManager
 
FirebaseManager.FirebaseCallback
Callback interface used for Firebase operations that do not return data.
LotterySuccessDialogFragment
DialogFragment displayed after a successful lottery draw.
NavWiring
Utility class for wiring and managing bottom navigation bar across multiple entrant activities.
NotificationItem
Represents a single notification entry shown to an entrant within notifications screen of Lottery System app.
NotificationItem.InvitationResponse
 
NotificationsActivity
Displays a scrollable list of all notifications relevant to current entrant.
NotificationsAdapter
Bridges a list of NotificationItems to the RecyclerView UI in NotificationsActivity.
NotificationsLocalStore
Provides persistent local storage for user responses to invitation-type notifications.
OrganizerDashboardFragment
Fragment representing the organizer's main dashboard.
OrganizerMainActivity
Main activity for organizers.
ProfileHostActivity
Serves as the container for entrant profile-related fragments.
ProfilePrefs
Local profile storage using SharedPreferences.
QRCodeDisplayFragment
Fragment responsible for displaying promotional and check-in QR codes associated with a specific event.
QRCodeGenerator
Utility class for generating QR codes for event data and check-in purposes.
Registration
Represents an entrant’s registration record for a specific event.
SearchableActivity
 
SearchResultsActivity
 
SelectedListFragment
Displays and manages the list of selected entrants for an event.
TabsPagerAdapter
Adapter for managing tabs in the organizer view pager.
TestInvitationDecisionRepo
Test-only repo for invite decisions (accept/decline)
TestProfileStore
Test-only profile store that uses FakeKeyValueStore.
User
Model class representing a user (entrant) in the lottery system.
UserInfo
Controller class for user information sign-up flow.
UserInfoTest
 
UserInfoView
View class for the user information sign-up screen.
WaitingListFragment
Displays the list of entrants currently on the waiting list.
